## CreateMeasure

Create a Measure in the calling app.

### Parameters

-   `name` **[string][47]** 
-   `defintion` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
CreateMeasure(nameField, defField)
```

```javascript
CreateMeasure('Total Sales', 'Sum(Sales)')
```

Returns **[string][47]** status - "Created" or "Replaced" plus any validation error messages.

## DecodeURI

The decodeURI() function decodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) previously created by encodeURI() or by a similar routine.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
DecodeURI('my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab')  // returns 'my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][47]** 

## DecodeURIComponent

The decodeURIComponent() function decodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component previously created by encodeURIComponent or by a similar routine.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURIComponent('https%3A%2F%2Fw3schools.com%2Fmy%20test.asp%3Fname%3Dst%C3%A5le%26car%3Dsaab')  // returns 'https://w3schools.com/my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][47]** 

## Decrypt

Decrypt a value.

### Parameters

-   `ciphertext` **[string][47]** to decrypt, as generated by the Encrypt() function.
-   `passphrase` **[string][47]** to decrypt with.  This must be the same passphrase that was used in Encrypt().

### Examples

```javascript
Decrypt(EncCreditCard, 'secret phrase')
```

Returns **[string][47]** unencrypted text.

## DoCreateMeasure

### Parameters

-   `$0` **[Object][48]** 
    -   `$0.name`  
    -   `$0.def`  
    -   `$0.commonHeader`  

## EncodeURI

Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURI('my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab')  // returns 'my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][47]** 

## EncodeURIComponent

Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
EncodeURIComponent('my test.asp?name=st책le&car=saab')  // returns 'my%20test.asp?name=st%C3%A5le&car=saab'
```

Returns **[string][47]** 

## Encrypt

Encrypt a value.

### Parameters

-   `plaintext` **[string][47]** to encrypt.
-   `passphrase` **[string][47]** to encrpyt with.

### Examples

```javascript
Encrypt(CreditCard, 'secret phrase')
```

Returns **[string][47]** encrypted text.

## ExampleAggregation

Sample of Aggregation FunctionType. Sums the value of a field, same as Qlik Sum().

### Parameters

-   `fieldname` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
ExampleAggregation(myfield)
```

Returns **[number][49]** 

## ExampleScalar

Sample of Scalar FunctionType. Returns true if num1 GT num2, otherwise false

### Parameters

-   `num1` **[string][47]** 
-   `num2` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
ExampleScalar(field1, field2)
```

Returns **[number][49]** boolean

## ExampleTensor

Sample of Tensor FunctionType. 

<p>Aggregates column2 values by column1 dim values. 
<p>Same as script "LOAD Col1 as Dim, Sum(Col2) as Value FROM .. Group By Col1"

### Parameters

-   `tablename` **tabledescription** {dim, value} - describing two fields, dim being Dimension, value is field to aggregate. See

Returns **table** table with two columns, "Dim", "Value"

## ExtractHtmlText

Extracts text node contents from an HTML string.

### Parameters

-   `htmlString` **[string][47]** 

Returns **[string][47]** text - The text value, which should be the HTML string minus tag elements.

## get

-   **See: [https://medium.com/javascript-inside/safely-accessing-deeply-nested-values-in-javascript-99bf72a0855a][50]**

Safely get a nested object.

### Parameters

-   `p` **[Array][51]&lt;[string][47]>** An array of the names of the desired objects.
-   `o` **[object][48]** The object to fetch items from.

Returns **[object][48]** The resulting object or null.

## RegexTest

Tests a string for match with a regular expression.

### Parameters

-   `stringToTest` **[string][47]** The string to test with the regular expression.
-   `pattern` **[string][47]** The regular expression pattern to use in the test.

Returns **[number][49]** boolean - 0 if false, -1 if true.

## Reverse

Reverses the characters in a string.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
Reverse('Hello World')  // returns 'dlroW olleH'
```

Returns **[string][47]** 

## SortList

Sorts the elements of a string list into alphabetical order. Leading and trailing spaces are removed from the elements. 

<p>A string list is a string where the elements are separated by a common delimiter.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 
-   `separator` **[string][47]** 

### Examples

```javascript
SortList('John, Zack, Aaron', ',')  // returns 'Aaron,John,Zack'
```

```javascript
SortList('John| Zack| Aaron' '|')  // returns 'Aaron|John|Zack'
```

Returns **[string][47]** text - The text value, which should be the HTML string minus tag elements.

## Space

Replace multiple spaces between words with count spaces.

### Parameters

-   `str` **[string][47]** 
-   `count` **[number][49]** 

### Examples

```javascript
Space('Sometimes    more than     one', 1)  // returns 'Sometimes more than one'
```

Returns **[string][47]**
